attributes.action: Introduce a One Health Badge for Community Nursing to deliver essential nursing.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of the permits across London vary.  Permits are offered at the discretion of the London Parking Authorities.  The existing various permits have no legal status.  Nurses have faced fines and have had their cars clamped.  AOne Health Badge would removed the inconsistencies across London, this should be recognised by Traffic Wardens and Car Clamping Agencies.
attributes.background: Not all staff have access to parking permits.  This causes parking fines and staff looking out of the window to keep an eye on their vehicle.  Permits differ between Boroughs and Councils are charging NHS Trusts for permits.
